import useState from "react" export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); useEffect(() =>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products?'+searchParams) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(res => setProducts(res.products)) },[]) return
